application.name: Clementine Music Player
application.summary: Plays music files and internet radio

description.p: Clementine is a multiplatform music player focusing on a fast and easy-to-use interface for searching and playing your music.

ul.li: Search and play your local music library
Listen to internet radio from Last.fm, SomaFM, IntergalacticFM, Magnatune, Jamendo and Icecast
Tabbed playlists, import and export M3U, XSPF, PLS and ASX
Transcode music into MP3, Ogg Vorbis, Ogg Speex, FLAC or AA
Edit tags on MP3 and OGG files, organise your music
Download missing album cover art from Last.fm
Supports MPRIS, or remote control using the command-line
Remote control using a Wii Remote, MPRIS or the command-line
Copy music to your iPod, iPhone, MTP or mass-storage USB player
